channel.title: Configure Whonix for Windows 11 traffic | NOT VM
channel.description:
Hi there!
Can I Configure Whonix for Windows 11 traffic?
means I will install\Configure (Workstation\Gateway ) and keep it running in the virtual box ,,,,
However I need to do it on my Windows 11 physical PC ( where virtual box is running )
Got it?
Thanks in advance

item.title: Configure Whonix for Windows 11 traffic | NOT VM

item.description:
Correct enough, though…

Torify Host Operating System

Windows: this is unlikely to be developed in the near or longer term without contributions from the Whonix ™ community.
